  "description": "Compass Power Solutions Limited is an industrial leader in the electrical power business in Nigeria since its establishment in 2008. Our aim was to supply the Nigerian market with the latest technologies in this field and in order to achieve that, we have signed partnership with reputable Multi-national companies partnership with reputable Multi-national companies specialized in power production, distribution and control.



Compass Power Solutions is a vendor of various kinds of Medium and Low Voltage equipment for the residential, industrial, and commercial sectors. Moreover, Compass Power Solutions Limited is an industrial leader in the design, assembly and installation of diverse types of low voltage panel boards, ideal for your organization&rsquo;s power needs. Compass Power Solutions Limited is a certified panel builder of Schneider&rsquo;s type tested panels (Prisma G and Prisma P) and Legrand type tested panels (XL3-6300) Compass Power Solutions Limited is now Schneider Electric partner for Datacenter&rsquo;s equipment as well (Cooling Units, Racks, PDUs, UPSs, raised floor).



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Electrical Engineering Supervisor

Job Location:&nbsp;Apapa, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-tim



Experience


	Eng/HND. in Electrical/Electronic Engineering.
	5 yrs of Experience




Method of Application&nbsp;



Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;&nbsp;hr@compass-ng.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Electrical Engineering Supervisor Job at Compass Power Solutions Limited




        
    

        
        Compass Power Solutions Limited is an industrial leader in the electrical power business in Nigeria since its establishment in 2008. Our aim was to supply the Nigerian market with the latest technologies in this field and in order to achieve that, we have signed partnership with reputable Multi-national companies partnership with reputable Multi-national companies specialized in power production, distribution and control.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    





Compass Power Solutions is a vendor of various kinds of Medium and Low Voltage equipment for the residential, industrial, and commercial sectors. Moreover, Compass Power Solutions Limited is an industrial leader in the design, assembly and installation of diverse types of low voltage panel boards, ideal for your organization’s power needs. Compass Power Solutions Limited is a certified panel builder of Schneider’s type tested panels (Prisma G and Prisma P) and Legrand type tested panels (XL3-6300) Compass Power Solutions Limited is now Schneider Electric partner for Datacenter’s equipment as well (Cooling Units, Racks, PDUs, UPSs, raised floor).



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Electrical Engineering Supervisor

Job Location: Apapa, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-tim



Experience


	Eng/HND. in Electrical/Electronic Engineering.
	5 yrs of Experience




Method of Application 



Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:  hr@compass-ng.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.





Compass Power Solutions is a vendor of various kinds of Medium and Low Voltage equipment for the residential, industrial, and commercial sectors. Moreover, Compass Power Solutions Limited is an industrial leader in the design, assembly and installation of diverse types of low voltage panel boards, ideal for your organization’s power needs. Compass Power Solutions Limited is a certified panel builder of Schneider’s type tested panels (Prisma G and Prisma P) and Legrand type tested panels (XL3-6300) Compass Power Solutions Limited is now Schneider Electric partner for Datacenter’s equipment as well (Cooling Units, Racks, PDUs, UPSs, raised floor).



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Title: Electrical Engineering Supervisor

Location: Apapa, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-tim



Experience


	Eng/HND. in Electrical/Electronic Engineering.
	5 yrs Experience




Application Closing Date
16th December, 2025.



How To Apply
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:  hr@compass-ng.com using the Job Title as the subject of the email.


 
    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Business Development Manager",
  "description": "PWAN Group is a leading real estate investment and network marketing company in Nigeria, dedicated to providing affordable housing solutions and lucrative investment opportunities. With a strong presence nationwide, we pride ourselves on excellence, integrity, and customer satisfaction.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Abeokuta, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Drive sales growth and achieve monthly/quarterly targets.
	Recruit, train, and supervise a team of marketers/BDEs.
	Identify new market opportunities within Abeokuta and surrounding areas.
	Build strong relationships with clients, investors, partners, and cooperatives.
	Organize and oversee site inspections, presentations, and marketing activities.
	Prepare weekly and monthly performance reports for management.
	Promote PWAN products and ensure strong brand visibility in the region.


Requirements


	Minimum of 6&ndash;7 years of experience in Business Development, Sales, or Marketing.
	Experience in real estate is a strong advantage.
	Strong leadership, negotiation, and communication skills.
	Proactive, target-driven, and able to work under minimal supervision.
	Good knowledge of Abeokuta/Ogun State market.
	Must reside in Abeokuta or be willing to relocate.
	Proficiency in MS Office is required.


What We Offer


	Attractive salary + commissions + performance bonuses.
	Growth opportunities within the PWAN network.
	Supportive and structured work environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr@pwangroup.com&nbsp;using&nbsp;&quot;Business Development Manager &ndash; Abeokuta&quot;&nbsp;as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2025-12-10",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "pwan group"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",

      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }

  "identifier": {

    "name": "",

  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 0,

      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }

}



Business Development Manager Job at PWAN Group




        
    

        
        PWAN Group is a leading real estate investment and network marketing company in Nigeria, dedicated to providing affordable housing solutions and lucrative investment opportunities. With a strong presence nationwide, we pride ourselves on excellence, integrity, and customer satisfaction.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Manager

Job Location: Abeokuta, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Drive sales growth and achieve monthly/quarterly targets.
	Recruit, train, and supervise a team of marketers/BDEs.
	Identify new market opportunities within Abeokuta and surrounding areas.
	Build strong relationships with clients, investors, partners, and cooperatives.
	Organize and oversee site inspections, presentations, and marketing activities.
	Prepare weekly and monthly performance reports for management.
	Promote PWAN products and ensure strong brand visibility in the region.


Requirements


	Minimum of 6–7 years of experience in Business Development, Sales, or Marketing.
	Experience in real estate is a strong advantage.
	Strong leadership, negotiation, and communication skills.
	Proactive, target-driven, and able to work under minimal supervision.
	Good knowledge of Abeokuta/Ogun State market.
	Must reside in Abeokuta or be willing to relocate.
	Proficiency in MS Office is required.


What We Offer


	Attractive salary + commissions + performance bonuses.
	Growth opportunities within the PWAN network.
	Supportive and structured work environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@pwangroup.com using "Business Development Manager – Abeokuta" as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Technical Assistant",
  "description": "Compass Power Solutions Limited is an industrial leader in the electrical power business in Nigeria since its establishment in 2008. Our aim was to supply the Nigerian market with the latest technologies in this field and in order to achieve that, we have signed partnership with reputable Multi-national companies partnership with reputable Multi-national companies specialized in power production, distribution and control.

Compass Power Solutions is a vendor of various kinds of Medium and Low Voltage equipment for the residential, industrial, and commercial sectors. Moreover, Compass Power Solutions Limited is an industrial leader in the design, assembly and installation of diverse types of low voltage panel boards, ideal for your organization&rsquo;s power needs. Compass Power Solutions Limited is a certified panel builder of Schneider&rsquo;s type tested panels (Prisma G and Prisma P) and Legrand type tested panels (XL3-6300) Compass Power Solutions Limited is now Schneider Electric partner for Datacenter&rsquo;s equipment as well (Cooling Units, Racks, PDUs, UPSs, raised floor).

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Technical Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Apapa, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-tim

Experience


	B.Eng/HND. in Electrical / Electronic Engineering
	2 years of Experience in Assembly and Installation of diverse types of low voltage panel boards.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr@compass-ng.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Technical Assistant Job at Compass Power Solutions Limited




        
    

        
        Compass Power Solutions Limited is an industrial leader in the electrical power business in Nigeria since its establishment in 2008. Our aim was to supply the Nigerian market with the latest technologies in this field and in order to achieve that, we have signed partnership with reputable Multi-national companies partnership with reputable Multi-national companies specialized in power production, distribution and control.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Compass Power Solutions is a vendor of various kinds of Medium and Low Voltage equipment for the residential, industrial, and commercial sectors. Moreover, Compass Power Solutions Limited is an industrial leader in the design, assembly and installation of diverse types of low voltage panel boards, ideal for your organization’s power needs. Compass Power Solutions Limited is a certified panel builder of Schneider’s type tested panels (Prisma G and Prisma P) and Legrand type tested panels (XL3-6300) Compass Power Solutions Limited is now Schneider Electric partner for Datacenter’s equipment as well (Cooling Units, Racks, PDUs, UPSs, raised floor).

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Technical Assistant

Job Location: Apapa, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-tim

Experience


	B.Eng/HND. in Electrical / Electronic Engineering
	2 years of Experience in Assembly and Installation of diverse types of low voltage panel boards.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@compass-ng.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Auto Engineer",
  "description": "Choice Talents NG is Nigeria&rsquo;s preferred talents management company. Our goal is to help build successful businesses through effective talent, resource and process management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Auto Engineer
Job Locations:&nbsp;Abuja(FCT), Lagos and Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Overview


	The Automobile Engineeris responsible for diagnosing, maintaining, and repairing a wide range of vehicles in line with manufacturer specifications and workshop standards.
	The ideal candidate is technically sound, efficient, and committed to quality service delivery.


Key Duties &amp; Responsibilities
Vehicle Diagnostics &amp; Repairs:


	Diagnose faults in engines, transmissions, brakes, suspensions, steering systems, and electrical components.
	Carry out mechanical and electrical repairs and servicing on cars, SUVs, and light-duty vehicles.
	Use diagnostic tools and equipment to identify issues and ensure accurate fixes.
	Perform test drives and quality checks before job completion.


Maintenance &amp; Preventive Care:


	Conduct periodic maintenance and inspection according to schedules.
	Identify worn or defective parts and recommend replacements.
	Ensure all work is carried out in line with safety and quality protocols.


Workshop Operations:


	Update job cards and service reports accurately.
	Maintain cleanliness and orderliness of assigned work areas.
	Collaborate with service advisors and parts department for efficient job flow.
	Comply with all health, safety, and environmental regulations.


Requirements


	Minimum of Trade Test Certification (Grade I, II, or III) in Mechanical or Electrical Auto Work.
	3+ years of practical experience in automotive repairs and diagnostics.
	Strong technical knowledge of vehicle systems and workshop procedures.
	Hands-on experience using diagnostic tools and service equipment.
	Experience with Mercedes, Toyota and Ford vehicles will be an added advantage.
	Ability to read and interpret service manuals and repair instructions.
	Good teamwork, communication, and time management skills.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;jobs@choicetalents.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-01",

  },

Auto Engineer Job at Choice Talents NG




        
    

        
        Choice Talents NG is Nigeria’s preferred talents management company. Our goal is to help build successful businesses through effective talent, resource and process management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Auto Engineer
Job Locations: Abuja(FCT), Lagos and Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Overview
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Automobile Engineeris responsible for diagnosing, maintaining, and repairing a wide range of vehicles in line with manufacturer specifications and workshop standards.
	The ideal candidate is technically sound, efficient, and committed to quality service delivery.


Key Duties & Responsibilities
Vehicle Diagnostics & Repairs:


	Diagnose faults in engines, transmissions, brakes, suspensions, steering systems, and electrical components.
	Carry out mechanical and electrical repairs and servicing on cars, SUVs, and light-duty vehicles.
	Use diagnostic tools and equipment to identify issues and ensure accurate fixes.
	Perform test drives and quality checks before job completion.


Maintenance & Preventive Care:


	Conduct periodic maintenance and inspection according to schedules.
	Identify worn or defective parts and recommend replacements.
	Ensure all work is carried out in line with safety and quality protocols.


Workshop Operations:


	Update job cards and service reports accurately.
	Maintain cleanliness and orderliness of assigned work areas.
	Collaborate with service advisors and parts department for efficient job flow.
	Comply with all health, safety, and environmental regulations.


Requirements


	Minimum of Trade Test Certification (Grade I, II, or III) in Mechanical or Electrical Auto Work.
	3+ years of practical experience in automotive repairs and diagnostics.
	Strong technical knowledge of vehicle systems and workshop procedures.
	Hands-on experience using diagnostic tools and service equipment.
	Experience with Mercedes, Toyota and Ford vehicles will be an added advantage.
	Ability to read and interpret service manuals and repair instructions.
	Good teamwork, communication, and time management skills.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobs@choicetalents.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Frontend Developer",
  "description": "Crossover Microfinance Bank Limited is a state licensed mfb with the central Bank of Nigeria approval to operate in Lagos state.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Frontend Developer

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	We are looking for a talented Frontend Developer with strong experience in Vue.js and a good understanding of React Native to join our growing tech team .
	You will be responsible for building high-performing, user-friendly web and mobile&nbsp;applications while collaborating closely with our design and backend teams.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and maintain responsive web interfaces using Vue.js.
	Contribute to mobile application development using React Native.
	Integrate RESTful APIs and third-party libraries efficiently.
	Collaborate with designers to implement clean and scalable UI components.
	Optimize performance for maximum speed and scalability.
	Participate in code reviews and ensure best practices across projects.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.
	2+ years of experience in frontend development, with proven Vue.js and React Native projects.
	Strong problem-solving mindset and attention to detail.
	Excellent communication and teamwork skills.


Salary
N300,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and portfolio (if available) to:&nbsp;royalrecruitment77@gmail.com&nbsp;using&nbsp;&ldquo;Frontend Developer&rdquo; as the subject of the mail.",

Frontend Developer Job at Crossover Microfinance Bank




        
    

        
        Crossover Microfinance Bank Limited is a state licensed mfb with the central Bank of Nigeria approval to operate in Lagos state.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Frontend Developer

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a talented Frontend Developer with strong experience in Vue.js and a good understanding of React Native to join our growing tech team .
	You will be responsible for building high-performing, user-friendly web and mobile applications while collaborating closely with our design and backend teams.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and maintain responsive web interfaces using Vue.js.
	Contribute to mobile application development using React Native.
	Integrate RESTful APIs and third-party libraries efficiently.
	Collaborate with designers to implement clean and scalable UI components.
	Optimize performance for maximum speed and scalability.
	Participate in code reviews and ensure best practices across projects.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.
	2+ years of experience in frontend development, with proven Vue.js and React Native projects.
	Strong problem-solving mindset and attention to detail.
	Excellent communication and teamwork skills.


Salary
N300,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and portfolio (if available) to: royalrecruitment77@gmail.com using “Frontend Developer” as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply
